titles.title: To direct the United States International Trade Commission to carry out a study on the inflationary impact of the tariffs imposed by certain executive orders and to report to Congress the findings of such study.

To direct the United States International Trade Commission to carry out a study on the inflationary impact of the tariffs imposed by certain executive orders and to report to Congress the findings of such study.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
